metric_description: Check for Data Exfiltration
metric_query: index=bro sourcetype=corelight_conn | stats sum(bytes_out) by src_ip

metric_description: Look for non US keyboard layouts.  RDP sessions will track keyboard layouts.
metric_query: index=bro sourcetype=corelight_rdp keyboard_layout!="English - United States" | stats count by keyboard_layout, src_ip, dest_ip

metric_description: Screen Resolution of less than 800x600 can be an indication of a script or automated rdp attempt.
Look for Source IP being below 1024.  Might indicate a reverse tunnel or a switch of src and dest
metric_query: index=bro sourcetype=corelight_conn src_port<9999 service in (http, ssl, rdp, ssh)

metric_description: Look at the DNS text response and see if it contains ascii characters
Look for multiple failed DNS requests.
metric_query: index=bro sourcetype=corelight_dns (rcode_name="NXDOMAIN" OR rcode_name="SERVFAIL" OR rcode_name="nxdomain" OR rcode_name="servfail")  | eventstats dc(query) as val by dest_ip | search val > 25 | table ts,id.orig_h,id.orig_p,id.resp_h,id.resp_p,proto,qtype_name,qtype,query,answers,rcode,rcode_name,trans_id,qtype,ttl,AA,uid

metric_description: Look for custom crypto being used.
Potential enumeration of user accounts on a domain controller.
metric_query: index=bro sourcetype=corelight_dce_rpc (operation="LsarLookupNames3" OR operation="LsarLookupSids3" OR operation="SamrGetGroupsForUser" OR operation="SamrLookupIdsInDomain" OR operation="SamrLookupNamesInDomain" OR operation="SamrQuerySecurityObject" OR operation="SamrQueryInformationGroup") | eventstats dc(operation) as val by id_orig_h | search val > 6 | table ts,src_ip,src_port,dest_ip,dest_port,endpoint,named_pipe,operation,uid

metric_description: Potential WebDav download.  Webdav allows files to be download and executed from a remote server.
metric_query: index=bro sourcetype=corelight_http ((c-useragent="*WebDAV*" OR uri="*webdav*") (resp_mime_types="*dosexec*" OR uri="*.exe")) | table ts,src_ip,src_port,dest_ip,dest_port,host,method,version,user_agent,status_code,status_msg,uri,referrer,request_body_len,response_body_len,orig_mime_types,resp_mime_types,proxied,origin,orig_fuids,resp_fuids,uid

metric_description: External Proxy Usage
metric_query: index=bro sourcetype=corelight_http (proxied="*" NOT (((src_ip="10.*" OR src_ip="192.168.*" OR src_ip="172.16..0.0/14" OR src_ip="127.*" OR src_ip="169.254.*") OR src_ip="::1" OR (src_ip="fe80::*" OR src_ip="fc00::*")))) | table host,src_ip,dest_ip,proxied

metric_description: Potential malicious mime and service type combinations
metric_query: index=bro sourcetype=corelight_http  ((((resp_mime_types="application/java-archive" OR resp_mime_types="application/mshelp" OR resp_mime_types="application/chrome-ext" OR resp_mime_types="application/x-object" OR resp_mime_types="application/x-executable" OR resp_mime_types="application/x-sharedlib" OR resp_mime_types="application/x-mach-o-executable" OR resp_mime_types="application/x-dosexec" OR resp_mime_types="application/x-java-applet" OR resp_mime_types="application/x-java-jnlp-file" OR resp_mime_types="text/x-php" OR resp_mime_types="text/x-perl" OR resp_mime_types="text/x-ruby" OR resp_mime_types="text/x-python" OR resp_mime_types="text/x-awk" OR resp_mime_types="text/x-tcl" OR resp_mime_types="text/x-lua" OR resp_mime_types="text/x-msdos-batch") (user_agent="*certutil*" OR user_agent="*powershell*" OR user_agent="*microsoft*" OR user_agent="*python*" OR user_agent="*libwww-perl*" OR user_agent="*go-http*" OR user_agent="*java/*" OR user_agent="*lua-resty-http*" OR user_agent="*winhttp*" OR user_agent="*vb project*" OR user_agent="*ruby*")) NOT ((id.orig_p="80" OR id.orig_p="8000" OR id.orig_p="8080" OR id.orig_p="8888")))  ((id.resp_h="10.*" OR id.resp_h="192.168.*" OR id.resp_h="172.16.0.0/14" OR id.resp_h="127.*" OR id.resp_h="169.254.*") OR id.resp_h="::1" OR (id.resp_h="fe80::*" OR id.resp_h="fc00::*")))

metric_description: Direct download from a link
metric_query: index=bro sourcetype=corelight_http ((method="GET" (uri="*.lnk" OR uri="*.LNK" OR uri="*.inf" OR uri="*.INF")) NOT (referrer="*"))

metric_description: SMB download from a link
metric_query: index=bro sourcetype=corelight_smb_files (name="*.lnk" OR name="*.LNK" OR name="*.inf" OR name="*.INF")

metric_description: Large number of queries from a single IP over a short amount of time may indicate malware
entropy on the query name may indicate dga or malicous site
abnormal length of query string. May indicate malicous location
lots of txt requests with long lengths may indicate c2
heartbeat requests may be indicator of c2
identify AD controllers using service dns requests
ssh bruteforce password guessing
ssh connections to non-standard port (not 22)
non-standard algorithms
non-standard clients
external to internal ssh communication
identify new systems that are using SSH based off baseline
PUT and DELETE http methods
500 alert types can be an indicator of attack
non-standard rdp port
identify new systems that are using rdp based off baseline
identify new cookies / usernames being used in rdp connections
ica field in an http log indicates citrix usage.
